author: Kyung Sarang
comment: Great watchface but I only wanted to try this and the steampunk face. It took awhile for it to install on my watch and when it did I could no longer refund it. Could I get a refund now so I can buy the steampunk face?  Thank you.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Kyung, if you encounter any problems just email me.

title: Just wanted to try it!

author: Jeremiah Berndt
comment: I wanted to love the watch face but it keeps on crashing Android Wear and just bogs down the watch completely. I am using it on a Zenwatch 2.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Jeremiah .... seems like you just need to reinstall it... you can email me if you wanna know how to do it like a boss.. Thanks for the comment

title: Wanted to love it...

author: Michael McKeever
comment: Great detail and creativity in all your creations. Please bring your Punisher watch face to Play Store. Thanks. 👍👍

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Michael, thanks for the great comment! I'll keep going, meanwhile until i bring it here, my other work can be found on my website.

title: Love your work

author: Allen N
comment: Love your watch face, big fan of deadpool.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Allen.. just wanted to say thanks for the support :)

title: Big fan

author: Jenny Eldershaw
comment: This watch face works perfectly, and is massively customisable but I don't find it either practical for my needs or attractive. Maybe this has to do with having a square watch (SW3) and being used to the face I have had for the past 18 months. I'll happily recommend it from a functionality point of view and it installed and operates 100%..... but the pics on the Android Authority review made it look very different from my reality. Still, it wasn't a heap of money and I hope the developer puts it to good use

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Jenny, well we can't argue tastes now can we? But he fact you came here to give a nice review regardless is pretty cool. If you email me im sure i can make you happy again :)

title: Hmmmm..........

author: Logan Jarrett
comment: This watchface is sick. With the always on feature for my LG Watch Urbane 2 the ambience mode is really cool. My only gripe is that no matter how many times I disable the analog hands, it reverts back to enabled as soon as I exit the settings. Would be a 5 otherwise.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Logan, if you want you can send me a email and we'll talk about it.. maybe we're just missing something... Thanks for the feedback!

title: Awesome face

author: Wade Staab
comment: I love the watch faces (and icon packs) from The Phlash and have purchased a number of them. The only gripe I have is with the weather reading. The watch face always seems to be about 10 degrees off the actual temp. I have tried different settings, but not much success. Very possible I have the settings incorrect. Either way, awesome job.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Wade... yeah seems to be things that are out of my grasp  for now... believe tho... its something i work on daily :) Thanks so much for taking the time to leave a review... its much appreciated.

title: Love it

author: Jared
comment: Tha Phlash has been styling my phone with icon packs and now watch faces since he started his jams and I hope he never stops. Buy all his watch faces and the only problem you'll have is choosing which one.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Jared, thanks for the props, it goes a long way!!!

title: Deadpool watch kills!

author: Christopher Lewis
comment: Dang, this face is totes dank legit. Really on point. I dig how they keep the analog in there for aesthetics (and generally looking cool), but also leave the digital in there for quick watch glances. The space management is real sick, to boot.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Christopher, this is a very eloquent review my friend, thanks a lot for taking the time its much appreciated!

author: David Harber II
comment: I poked around through some different faces, and they all were a disappointment. I wish I had started with this one! Excellent face, very customizable. I have an issue with the temp being inaccurate, but I saw it addressed in a previous review, so I'll sit tight!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up David, yeah i been working on it pretty intensely... Thanks for the support and review, it helps keep the moral :)

title: I love it

author: Gary Florizone
comment: I have a s2  classic . I cannot get this watch face to work. I am going to uninstall and maybe get my money back.                                     I recieved a note about my rating. I will change it as I have been informed the app will not wok with the gear s2 classic. To bad as it looks inviting.  When I get my funds back I will be more exited.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Gary, just email me ill get you setup. And yeah my watch faces are for Android Wear only.. But your watch is not Android Wear its Tizen...

title: Can't get it to work

author: Samuel Bradshaw
comment: I like it a lot. Looks great. I had the issue where the battery was stuck at 70 but thanks to phlash replying to everyone I was able to fix the issue. Just change the watch face to something else and switch back to this one.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Samuel, thanks for the support and sharing your experience, pretty cool :)

title: Works as advertised

author: Jed Marsillo
comment: This is a super slick watch face. Lots of customization. Top not notch all around. It is replacing Navi watch face also from Tha Phlash. I'll be using this new mercenary watch face on my moto 360 for a long time.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Jed, thanks for the props! Always good to hear!

author: Sean Walker
comment: ...the Display Screen On Time lasts only a few seconds before fading out on my LG G Watch R. I have the same issue with the NOW watch face

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Sean... if you want you can email me and i will test the on-screen time option with you.There's a menu for it withing the setting menu on the phone app side of the watch face, thanks for the feedback.

title: Great watch face but...

author: Steve Corbett
comment: I really like it.  Only problem is the phone battery % is stuck at 70%.  Using a Moto 360 and Moto X Pure.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Steve, try to switch to another face and back to this one, i think its gonna jerk it in place... ill look into that for the future... Thanks for the comment i appreciate it!

author: Jesse The Couch Movie Critic
comment: As always man nothing but the best from you man! Always the most polished watches, clean lines and the stuff I want woke up looking for something fresh and dope checked on ur updates and another stunner. Any chance you can add seconds to the digital part of the watch? Thanks again Homie.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Jesse, yeah ill look into it.. the problem arise when the watch goes in ambient and i need to remove the seconds... so to avoid confusion i removed them altogether, ill see if i can make it an option. Thanks for the support!

title: Phlash you did it again!

author: edric clyde
comment: Did everything in the description and and 2 days later still don't have the app on my watch.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Edric, you waited 2 days to let me know?? You are a patient man, ppl usually email me 10 minutes after they buy if its not loaded, at which point i tell them to email me so i can help them. Maybe you dont have the right watch, maybe your phone is close... they are things i need to know first so i can help you! Email me bro.
